actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the alternative fuels credit for liquified petroleum gas through 2010.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2010 the excise tax credit for alternative fuels and fuel mixtures for any sale or use involving liquified petroleum gas.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the alternative fuels credit for liquified petroleum gas through 2010.
